description: Convert Philips PAR/REC files to AFNI's BRIK/HEAD, NIfTI, or ANALYZE format

skip_outliers_test.title: Skip Outliers Test Flag
skip_outliers_test.description: Skip the outliers test when converting 4D files. The default is to perform the outliers test.

output_nifti.title: Output NIfTI Flag
output_nifti.description: Output NIfTI files instead of HEAD/BRIK. The default is to create HEAD/BRIK files.

output_analyze.title: Output ANALYZE Flag
output_analyze.description: Output ANALYZE files instead of HEAD/BRIK.

output_dir.title: Output Directory
output_dir.description: The name of the directory where the created files should be placed. If this directory does not exist, the program exits without performing any conversion.

gzip_files.title: Gzip Files Flag
gzip_files.description: Gzip the files created. The default is not to gzip the files.

byte_swap_2.title: 2 Byte Swap Flag
byte_swap_2.description: 2-Byte-swap the files created. The default is not to 2 byte-swap.

byte_swap_4.title: 4 Byte Swap Flag
byte_swap_4.description: 4-Byte-swap the files created. The default is not to 4 byte-swap.
